Navigation Documentation Introduction Documentation Guides API Reference SDKs Resources Cobalt home page v1 Postman Get Your API Key Examples Documentation Introduction Quickstart Glossary Implementation Guide Get Started Integrate Communicate Test Integration Additional Deploy Concepts Linked Accounts Auth Flows Logs Workflow App Config Integrations Custom Apps Documentation Introduction Welcome to Cobalt! Cobalt is a dev tool to enable SaaS companies add 3rd party native integration. This allows teams to avoid the cost, time, and risk that comes with building and maintaining their own integrations solution. A single installation of cobalt takes just a couple hours and enables your application to support integrations with the most popular SaaS apps. ​ Setting up The first step to world-class documentation is setting up your editing environnments. Quickstart Quickstart your development and launch integrations in a jiffy. Glossary List of frequently used terms in the docs and APIs Examples Build your first integration with Cobalt by following these guides. ​ Explore Guides to commonly used Cobalt features to make the most of our platform. Cobalt Basics Start by setting up your application Auth Flows Understand different kinds of supported auth flows Workflows Learn about the basics of workflows Webhooks Learn about the Cobalt Webhook events ​ SDKs Client-Side SDKs Vanilla JS Highly customizable frontend sdk React JS React SDK for quick Auth flow setup Server-Side SDKs Node JS (Preferred) Server side SDK for more flexibility Quickstart linkedin twitter Powered by Mintlify On this page Setting up Explore SDKs
